item.title: Autoland Status Annunciators – Two ASA's Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For all approaches other than autoland, 2 ASAs may be inoperative.
For autoland conditions requiring LAND 2 ASA annunciation, 1 ASA for the pilot conducting the approach is required. During monitored approach operations, the Captain's ASA must be operative.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 1.

placard.para: Placard Autoland Status Annunciators "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
